title: Jeb: 翅膀的纹理随披风变化，最终将可以自定义
author: obby825
txt_content:
1.jpg (226.03 KB, 下载次数: 12)

下载附件

2015-10-13 20:18 上传





Jeb: A few Elytra textures for capes... but don't fret! I've researched the hurdles to make the textures customizable as skins, and it will be added eventually (unknown ETA)
Jeb: 一些为披风准备的翅膀的纹理……但是别担心！我研究过了将纹理作为皮肤自定义的障碍，并且它将最终被加入（没有时间表）

http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/3ok5oa/a_few_elytra_textures_for_capes_but_dont_fret_ive/


sjjklh注：图中的的纹理都是现有披风的纹理。别问我怎么这么清楚
